entry.div:
Catching
birds
In winter
, when the
birds
have molted, skin them & fill them with
stuffing cloth
&
,
or else
dry them in an
oven
#
. Then arrange them on the trees, & have
someone who sings
, & you will gather them & catch many.
in an
oven
that is scarcely hot
In winter
.
il
And
in summer
this is done because, before they
would be dried, the
fly
would get into their eyes
and make
worms
.
In winter
they are prepared better & dry by themselves
